lines: You are in a large department store waiting in line and there is an extremely well-endowed woman standing in front of you. She smiles. It looks like she may be an interesting person to talk to.
Which question would you like to ask her?
#"...MOMMY SAID THAT DADDY HAS A THICK SKULL. DO YOU?"
#"...I TRIED VERY HARD TO PINCH A PENNY LIKE AUNT EDNA BUT COULDN'T. CAN YOU?"
She tells you that she doesn't have a husband.
She tells you that she does have a husband.
She tells you, "No, no doggie. Only a cat." You inform her that Daddy said that that's what they cook in the restaurant on the corner.
Perhaps you are interested in asking something else...
The lady giggles and Mom puts her hand over your mouth and says, "Shhhhhhhhhhh!"
Perhaps you are interested in asking something else...
You don't get past the word "Aunt" before you are scooped up by your mother and dragged to a new line.
You have caused your mother enough embarrassment for one day.
The lady begins to ask YOU questions. You are shy and a little bit afraid of her. She begins to chat with your mom. Are you beginning to feel more friendly to her?
You remain quiet and leave the store with your mom.
